code: import Lenis from'@studio-freight/lenis';const lenis=()=>{const lenis=new Lenis({duration:1,easing:t=>Math.min(1,1.001-Math.pow(2,-10*t))});function raf(time){lenis.raf(time);requestAnimationFrame(raf);}requestAnimationFrame(raf);lenis.on("scroll",e=>{console.log(e);});};export default lenis;
